data.name: Don't Die In The West
data.detailed_description:
Official Discord Server

Follow us on Discord


About the Game

Don’t Die in the West is a wild west survival adventure game for 1-4 players. Explore the vast open prairie, the gloomy forests, the cold mountains and the procedurally generated abandoned mineshafts. Craft all needed survival items and tools, deadly six shooters, Winchester rifles, dynamite and even the legendary gatling gun. Build the biggest ranch the west has ever seen and top it all off with a master whiskey distillery. This is truly the ultimate western experience.



Adventure through the harsh environments. Move by foot or by horse from the scorching prairie to the cold mountains in the north. Each biome is filled with valuable resources that are needed in order to survive and thrive but tread carefully as they are also inhabited by foul creatures and dangerous foes - so come prepared.



Defend yourself against ferocious coyotes, mauling bears and poisonous snakes. Use your bow or Winchester rifle to hunt down animals for food and resources needed to upgrade your gear and ranch.



Collect resources to craft weapons and equipment to take on the many challenges of the wild west. Venture down the procedurally generated mineshafts and dig for hidden treasures and discover rare and valuable resources.



Build a small cabin and find shelter for the night or build an enormous ranch with workbenches, smelters, chemistry labs, animal husbandry and even a poker table so you can play with your friends.



Keep an eye on this page as we continuously reveal new features from the game.

Join our Discord

Join our Discord
data.short_description: An open-world survival western game for 1-4 players. Explore the prairie, forests, mountains and procedurally generated mineshafts. Craft items, tools, deadly revolvers and dynamite. Build your ranch and whiskey distillery. This is the ultimate western experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5/Ryzen 5 - 2ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5/Ryzen 5 - 2.5 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
